title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a simulation of Docker concepts:

1. Create a DockerImage class that:
   - Has layers array (each instruction adds a layer)
   - Has addLayer(instruction, size) method
   - Has build() method that shows total size

2. Create a DockerContainer class that:
   - Takes an image to run
   - Has start(), stop(), and status() methods
   - Tracks environment variables

3. Demonstrate multi-stage build concept by creating:
   - A 'build' image with dev dependencies
   - A 'production' image with only runtime files
instructions:

2. Create a DockerContainer class that:

hints.text: Use array to track layers, reduce() to calculate total size.
Multi-stage builds copy specific files from builder stage to production stage.

commonMistakes.consequence: Images are unnecessarily large with development dependencies
commonMistakes.correction: Use separate stages for building and production runtime
